It's the dude!

Game stops responding after it starts, when the rock shows up on the lower right corner.
Any workarounds?

This is already included on v1.02, but I'm guessing this is v1.0

Here's the fix to the initial freeze:

Go to your My Documents/My Games/UnrealEngine3/BoulderGame/Config directory and open up BoulderEngine.ini

In the top part change:
"Map=BoulderFrontEnd.bmap
LocalMap=Splash_cinametic.bmap
LocalOptions=
TransitionMap=BoulderFrontEnd.bmap"

To:
Map=BoulderFrontEnd.bmap
LocalMap=BoulderFrontEnd.bmap
LocalOptions=
TransitionMap=BoulderFrontEnd.bmap

Save it, and play the game.
